name: Project Alpha 1
architecture:
# System Architecture Blueprint: Claude Ops Platform

## 1. System Overview
The **Claude Ops Platform** is a modular monolith designed to manage the lifecycle of AI configurations. It enforces a strict separation of concerns through domain-driven design, utilizing a centralized event bus for asynchronous communication between the Configuration, Orchestration, Hooks, and Audit domains. This architecture ensures scalability (C002), traceability (C007), and security (C003).

## 2. Directory Structure

```bash
claude-ops-platform/
├── client/                          # F007: Frontend UI (React/TypeScript)
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── components/              # Shared UI components (Buttons, Tables)
│   │   ├── features/                # Domain-specific UI Logic
│   │   │   ├── config-editor/       # F001, F002: JSON Editors, Diff Views
│   │   │   ├── orchestration-viz/   # F003, F004: Pipeline Graphs
│   │   │   ├── hooks-manager/       # F005: Webhook forms
│   │   │   └── audit-log-viewer/    # F008: Datagrid with filters
│   │   ├── services/                # Axios instances & API methods
│   │   └── store/                   # Global State (Zustand/Redux)
├── server/                          # Backend (Go)
│   ├── cmd/
│   │   └── api-server/              # Main entrypoint
│   ├── internal/
│   │   ├── api/                     # C005: Interface Layer
│   │   │   ├── middleware/          # C003: JWT Auth, RBAC, RequestID
│   │   │   └── router.go            # Route definitions
│   │   ├── shared/                  # Shared Kernel
│   │   │   ├── eventbus/            # Async Event Pub/Sub interfaces
│   │   │   ├── database/            # Connection pooling (Postgres)
│   │   │   └── errors/              # C006: Standardized Error types
│   │   ├── modules/
│   │   │   ├── configuration/       # F001, F002
│   │   │   │   ├── domain/          # Aggregates: ClaudeConfig
│   │   │   │   ├── service/         # Logic: Versioning, Validation
│   │   │   │   └── repository/      # SQL Queries
│   │   │   ├── orchestration/       # F003, F004
│   │   │   │   ├── domain/          # Aggregates: Plan, Job
│   │   │   │   └── engine/          # Workflow Execution Logic
│   │   │   ├── hooks/               # F005, F006
│   │   │   │   ├── domain/          # Aggregates: HookDef
│   │   │   │   └── worker/          # Job consumers for HTTP/Script hooks
│   │   │   ├── audit/               # F008, C007
│   │   │   │   └── consumer/        # Async Log ingestion
│   │   │   └── identity/            # C003
│   │   │       └── service/         # User/Role Management
├── deployments/                     # C002: K8s Manifests, Helm Charts
├── docs/                            # OpenAPI/Swagger Specs
└── scripts/                         # DB Migrations (Flyway/Migrate)
```

## 3. Module Responsibilities & Interconnectivity

| Module | ID | Responsibilities | Key Dependencies | Data Owned |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Configuration** | `MOD_CONFIG` | CRUD for Claude Configs, Version Control, Schema Validation | Identity (User Context) | `claude_configs`, `config_versions` |
| **Orchestration** | `MOD_ORCH` | Definition of rollout plans, Execution of deployment steps | Config (Read Source), Hooks (Trigger) | `orch_plans`, `job_history` |
| **Hooks** | `MOD_HOOKS` | Manage definitions, Execute Pre/Post actions, Retry logic | Event Bus (Triggers) | `hook_definitions`, `hook_logs` |
| **Identity** | `MOD_AUTH` | Authentication, RBAC Policy Enforcement | None | `users`, `roles`, `permissions` |
| **Audit** | `MOD_AUDIT` | Immutable logging of all write operations | Event Bus (Listener) | `audit_logs` |

## 4. Key API Endpoints

| Method | Endpoint | Module | Description |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| `POST` | `/api/v1/configs` | Config | Create a new Claude Configuration version. |
| `GET` | `/api/v1/configs/{id}/history` | Config | Retrieve version history for a specific configuration. |
| `POST` | `/api/v1/plans/{id}/execute` | Orchestration | Trigger an orchestration plan execution. |
| `POST` | `/api/v1/hooks` | Hooks | Register a new lifecycle hook. |
| `GET` | `/api/v1/audit/logs` | Audit | Query audit logs with filters (time, user, entity). |

steps.name: Researcher

output.architecture:
# System Blueprint: Autonomous Orchestration & Configuration Nexus

## 1. System Overview
This architecture implements a modular, autonomous workflow system consisting of a configuration management layer for 'Claude' and a rigorous orchestration engine responsible for executing the *Researcher → Architect → Coder → Council* lifecycle.

## 2. Directory Structure

The project follows the **Standard Go Project Layout** adapted for modular monoliths.

```bash
project-root/
├── cmd/
│   └── server/
│       └── main.go                 # Application Entry Point (Wires modules)
├── internal/
│   ├── shared/                     # Domain primitives shared across modules
│   │   ├── domain/
│   │   └── infrastructure/
│   ├── modules/
│   │   ├── claude_config/          # [Module] Configuration Management
│   │   │   ├── delivery/           # HTTP Handlers (Gin/Echo)
│   │   │   ├── domain/             # Entity: ClaudeConfiguration
│   │   │   └── usecase/            # Logic: Validate & Persist Config
│   │   ├── orchestration/          # [Module] Workflow Orchestration
│   │   │   ├── engine/             # State Machine (The "Brain")
│   │   │   ├── lifecycle/          # Step implementations
│   │   │   │   ├── researcher.go
│   │   │   │   ├── architect.go
│   │   │   │   ├── coder.go
│   │   │   │   └── council.go
│   │   │   └── scheduler/          # Autonomous triggers (Cron/Tickers)
│   │   └── hooks_manager/          # [Module] Integration Hooks
│   │       ├── registry/           # Hook Storage
│   │       └── dispatcher/         # Execution Logic
│   └── infrastructure/             # Global Infra (DB Connection, Logger)
├── web/                            # Frontend (React/TypeScript)
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── components/           # UI Components
│   │   │   └── config-view/    # 'Claude Config' View & Form
│   │   └── services/             # API Clients
├── configs/                        # Environment Variables / Static Configs
└── docker-compose.yml              # Container orchestration
```

## 3. Module Responsibilities

| Module ID | Module Name | Core Responsibility | Key Dependencies |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **MOD-001** | **Claude Config** | Manages persistence and validation of AI settings. | Shared Kernel |
| **MOD-002** | **Orchestrator** | Enforces the 4-step lifecycle and triggers autonomous actions. | Claude Config, Hooks Manager |
| **MOD-003** | **Hooks Manager** | Dispatches synchronous/asynchronous events to external systems. | Shared Kernel |
| **UI-001** | **Web Client** | Provides a visual interface for configuration and monitoring. | HTTP API (MOD-001) |

## 4. API Endpoints (Primary)

| Method | Endpoint | Module | Description |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| `GET` | `/api/v1/config/claude` | MOD-001 | Retrieve current Claude configuration. |
| `PUT` | `/api/v1/config/claude` | MOD-001 | Update and validate configuration. |
| `GET` | `/api/v1/workflow/status` | MOD-002 | Get current state of the autonomous engine. |
| `POST` | `/api/v1/hooks/register` | MOD-003 | Register a new integration hook. |
output.mermaidGraph:
graph TD
    subgraph Frontend [Web Client UI-001]
        UI_View[Config View] -->|GET /config| API_GW
        UI_Save[Config Save] -->|PUT /config| API_GW
    end

    subgraph Backend [Go Application]
        API_GW[API Gateway / Router]
        
        subgraph ConfigMod [MOD-001 Claude Config]
            CC_Handler[HTTP Handler]
            CC_UC[UseCase Logic]
            CC_Repo[(DB Repository)]
        end

        subgraph OrchMod [MOD-002 Orchestration]
            Scheduler[Auto Scheduler]
            Engine[Lifecycle Engine]
            
            subgraph Lifecycle [Autonomous Steps]
                Step1[1. Researcher]
                Step2[2. Architect]
                Step3[3. Coder]
                Step4[4. Council]
            end
        end

        subgraph HooksMod [MOD-003 Hooks Manager]
            Registry[Hook Registry]
            Dispatcher[Event Dispatcher]
        end
    end

    %% Connections
    API_GW --> CC_Handler
    CC_Handler --> CC_UC
    CC_UC --> CC_Repo

    Scheduler --> Engine
    Engine --> Step1 --> Step2 --> Step3 --> Step4
    Step4 -.->|Loop| Step1

    Engine --Reads--> CC_UC
    Engine --Triggers--> Dispatcher
    Dispatcher --Lookup--> Registry

libraries.name: Gin Gonic
libraries.description: High-performance HTTP web framework for Go.

libraries.name: GORM
libraries.description: The fantastic ORM library for Golang.

libraries.name: Robfig/Cron
libraries.description: A cron library for Go to handle autonomous scheduling.

libraries.name: Viper
libraries.description: Go configuration with fangs - handles env vars and config files.

libraries.name: React Query (TanStack Query)
libraries.description: Powerful asynchronous state management for React.

mermaidGraph:
graph TD
    subgraph ClientLayer [Client Layer]
        UI[Web UI / CLI]
    end

    subgraph GatewayLayer [API Gateway & Middleware]
        Auth[Identity & Auth]
        Router[Request Router]
    end

    subgraph DomainLayer [Domain Modules]
        Config[MOD_CONFIG: Configuration]
        Orch[MOD_ORCHESTRATION: Workflow]
        Hooks[MOD_HOOKS: Automation]
    end

    subgraph SidecarLayer [Async Processors]
        Audit[MOD_AUDIT: Logging]
        JobQueue[Job Worker]
    end

    subgraph DataLayer [Persistence]
        DB[(Primary DB - Postgres)]
        Redis[(Cache / Queue)]
    end

    %% Flows
    UI -->|HTTPS| Auth
    Auth -->|Valid Context| Router
    
    Router -->|CRUD| Config
    Router -->|Execute| Orch
    Router -->|Manage| Hooks

    %% Cross-Module Data Flow
    Orch -->|Fetch Config| Config
    Orch -->|Trigger Event| Hooks

    %% Event Bus & Async
    Config -- Publish Event --> JobQueue
    Orch -- Publish Event --> JobQueue
    Hooks -- Publish Event --> JobQueue
    
    JobQueue -- Consume --> Audit
    JobQueue -- Consume (Retry) --> Hooks

    %% Persistence
    Config --> DB
    Orch --> DB
    Hooks --> DB
    Audit --> DB
    JobQueue --> Redis
